// Cold Front (curated / M+KB)
//notes:pandapaxxy (curated / M+KB): "Vorpal Weapon and Osmosis are also shaping up to be really strong this season. You will definitely want a larger magazine as I find 27 to be far too little."
dimwishlist:item=1506719573&perks=3250034553,3230963543,2387244414,1774574192

// Trophy Hunter (PvP / M+KB)

// Pyroclastic Flow (PvP / M+KB)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "In PvP rockets aren’t in the best place anymore, but these and the Hakke frames all make a case because they can get a variety of different perks not needing to have Tracking Module as one of their trait perks." Recommended MW: Blast Radius.

// Point of the Stag (curated / M+KB)
//notes:pandapaxxy (curated / M+KB): "If Hush is the hip-fire king, then Point of the Stag is the ADS king. With both Archer’s Tempo and Eye of the Storm if you take any damage your shots will almost magnetize themselves to your opponent’s head and you’ll get a faster follow up shot because of it!" Recommended MW: Draw Time.
dimwishlist:item=3434944005&perks=2801223209,1500996326,2866798147,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=3434944005&perks=2801223209,1500996326,201365942,1546637391
